engine_status: V2 CYCLE 7 COMPLETE -- NAICS-SYSTEMATIC EXPANSION + STRESS TEST. 187 -> 387 models via NAICS QCEW screening of 293 4-digit industries. Stress-tested scoring with 3 alternative weight vectors: 7 of top 10 robust across ALL vectors. Mapped 80-cell force x architecture matrix (16 impossible, 12 previously unexplored now filled). 8 new high-value sectors discovered via bottom-up NAICS scanning. TOP 5: (1) Multi-Shop CNC/Metal Fab Rollup (88), (2) AI Financial Intelligence Platform (87), (3) Acquire+Modernize CNC Shop (87), (4) Acquire+Modernize Specialty Food (86), (5) Healthcare AI Compliance Platform (86). KEY FINDINGS: Physical > digital is partially weight-conditional (physical more durable, digital data compounding more force). NAICS bottom-up scanning > top-down theme scanning for sector discovery. PE distress cascade extends to veterinary, dental, staffing, printing. 3 new patterns: P-019 NAICS Systematic Discovery, P-020 Weight-Conditional Rankings, P-021 PE Distress Multi-Sector.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Multi-Shop CNC/Metal Fab Rollup Platform
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Acquire 5-10 retiring-owner machine shops and metal fab facilities, deploy cobots + AI scheduling/quoting, operate as unified multi-site production platform. NAICS 3327+3323+3329: 1.02M employees, 46K establishments. SBA 504 fee waiver through Sept 2026. STRESS TEST: robust top 7 across ALL weight vectors.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Financial Intelligence Platform (Data Compounding)
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Full-service AI bookkeeping where every client generates financial pattern data, building unassailable intelligence moat. NAICS 5412+5611: 1.77M employees, $173B wages. 23M unserved SMBs. $0.05/month inference. STRESS TEST: #1 under force-dominant weights (89.6). Data moat impossible to replicate without equivalent client base.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Acquire + Modernize CNC Shop (Single Site)
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Buy retiring-owner CNC shop at 3-4x EBITDA ($1-3M), deploy cobots + AI scheduling, double throughput. HIGHEST convergence resistance (96). Capital stack: $3.5M total, $18K/mo debt service covered by $29K/mo EBITDA. STRESS TEST: robust, #1 under convergence-dominant weights.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Acquire + Modernize Specialty Food Producer
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Acquire retiring-owner specialty food producer (bakery, confectionery, preserved foods). Deploy cobots + AI QC. FSMA 204 compliance moat. NAICS 3118+3114+3113: 593K employees, 20K+ establishments. CRITICAL: specialty/branded only (20-35% margins). STRESS TEST: robust top 10 across all vectors.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Healthcare AI Multi-State Compliance Platform
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Compliance layer for every healthcare AI company: multi-state tracking across 250+ bills, bias auditing, documentation. NAICS 6211+6213+6214: 5.13M employees, $453B wages. Every new regulation permanently increases value. STRESS TEST: remarkably stable (rank 5-6) across all weight vectors.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Full-Service AI Finance Function for SMBs
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Replace entire finance function for SMBs at $149-499/mo. 23M unserved. 90%+ gross margin. Jevons: 70% unserved -> 3-5x TAM. Bench orphan customers (35K) for initial traction. STRESS TEST: FORCE-DEPENDENT -- top 2 under force-dominant, drops under compounding.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Full-Service Prior Auth + Denial Management for Independent Practices
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Full-service prior auth replacing in-house billing staff for independent practices. AMA: 61% say AI increases denials. WISeR creating provider-side urgency. NAICS 6211+6213: 4.05M employees, 426K establishments. STRESS TEST: robust top 9 across all vectors.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Clinical Denial Intelligence Platform (Data Compounding)
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Start with denial management service, compound into definitive payer denial pattern database across all 50 states. Bloomberg Terminal of healthcare revenue cycle. NAICS 6211+6214: 3.97M employees, $394B wages. STRESS TEST: robust top 10 under all vectors.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Acquire + Modernize Commercial Print Shop
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: NEW C7 DISCOVERY. Acquire retiring-owner print shops (28K establishments = HIGHEST manufacturing fragmentation). AI workflow automation, personalization, predictive maintenance. Print-on-demand $59.3B by 2033. 85% say AI critical, only 40% adopted. Employment declining 6.1% = pre-cascade.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Multi-Shop Commercial Print Rollup Platform
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: NEW C7 DISCOVERY. Consolidate 5-10 print shops into AI-native production network. Centralized prepress, scheduling, estimating. Shops cheaper than CNC ($200K-$1M). Position around growth segments: packaging, personalization, large format.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Acquire PE-Distressed Accounting Practice
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Acquire PE-distressed accounting practices at 2-3x (vs PE-purchased 8-12x). Convert to AI-native cost structure. $1.2T debt maturing 2027-2029. TIME-LIMITED: 2-3 year window.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Multi-Facility Specialty Food Production Platform
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Consolidate 3-5 specialty food producers. Shared AI QC, FSMA 204 compliance, distribution network. STRESS TEST: COMPOUNDING-DEPENDENT -- top 3 under compounding weights.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Operations Platform for Building Equipment Contractors
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: NEW C7 DISCOVERY. AI operations for HVAC/plumbing/electrical: dispatching, estimating, scheduling. NAICS 2382: 2.46M employees, 230K establishments, $190B wages. 70% can't find workers. 499K new workers needed 2026. ServiceTitan ($9.5B) serves enterprise -- small contractors underserved.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Insurance AI Compliance + Bias Auditing Platform
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Multi-state insurance AI compliance: NAIC model law, bias auditing, rate filing automation. NAICS 5241+5242: 2.56M employees, 222K establishments, $268B wages.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI-Matched Business Acquisition Marketplace
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: AI marketplace matching 2.34M retiring owners with acquirers. AI valuations, deal structuring, SBA 504 guidance. BizBuySell hasn't innovated. Transaction data creates moat.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Full-Service AI TPA (Third-Party Administrator)
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: AI-native TPA replacing 1,200+ small/mid TPAs. Full claims processing at 10x lower cost. TPA licensing creates moat. Avallon (YC S25, $4.6M) is direct competitor.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Acquire + Modernize Plastics Injection Molding Shop
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: NEW C7 DISCOVERY. Acquire plastics injection molding shop, deploy robotic part removal + AI quality control + predictive maintenance. NAICS 3261: 600K employees, 12K establishments, $39.6B wages. Reshoring tailwinds.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Full-Service AI Practice Operations for Allied Health
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: NEW C7 DISCOVERY. Full-service billing, scheduling, documentation for chiropractors, PTs, optometrists, speech therapists. NAICS 6213: 1.16M employees, 191K establishments -- MOST fragmented healthcare sector.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Manufacturing AI Deployment Stack
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: AI deployment platform for SME manufacturers: scheduling, QC, maintenance, analytics as plug-and-play modules. 98% interested, 20% adopted = massive gap. $500-5000/mo.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI-Native Dental Practice Rollup (Counter-PE)
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: NEW C7 DISCOVERY. Acquire independent dental practices at 3-5x (vs PE 8-12x), deploy AI billing/scheduling/imaging. NAICS 6212: 1.03M employees, 135K establishments. 137 PE dental deals 2024 but saturation + FTC scrutiny emerging. Counter-PE play.

stress_test_results.methodology: 3 alternative weight vectors tested on top 20 C6 models
stress_test_results.architecture_insight: Physical: 86.4 convergence > 86.1 compounding > 83.1 force. Data compounding: 88.1 force > 86.6 compounding > 81.0 convergence. Physical = more durable. Digital = more force.

key_insight: CYCLE 7 VALIDATES AND EXTENDS THE LANDSCAPE. (1) SCORING IS ROBUST: 7 of top 10 survive ALL weight vectors. Current weights aren't arbitrary. (2) PHYSICAL vs DIGITAL IS NUANCED: physical = more durable (highest convergence resistance), digital data compounding = more force (largest TAM). Strategy unchanged: START physical (timing windows), BUILD digital parallel (compounding). (3) NAICS BOTTOM-UP > TOP-DOWN: systematic NAICS screening discovers sectors invisible to theme scanning. Printing (28K estabs), building trades (2.46M workers), allied health (191K estabs) all entered top 20. (4) MATRIX IS COMPLETE: 80 cells mapped. 16 impossible. 12 unexplored now filled. (5) PE DISTRESS IS MULTI-SECTOR: extends beyond accounting to veterinary, dental, staffing, printing.
